title: Davidson Family Fund in Memory of Henry W. Ehrmann and Curtis W. Martin
description: To provide for special programs within the Department of Political Science; including the support of conferences, visiting lecture ships, publications and undergraduate scholarships or graduate fellowships, stipends and/or prizes.
marketingContent: To provide for special programs within the Department of Political Science; including the support of conferences, visiting lecture ships, publications and undergraduate scholarships or graduate fellowships, stipends and/or prizes.
